title: Marais little gem
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Lovely studio apartment available on a monthly basis. 25 square meters, queen size bed, fully equipped, on trendy rue Chapon in the Haut Marais. Kitchen with mezzanine bedroom (queen size bed), bathroom with small bathtub and small washing machine, separate toilet. 
Metro Rambuteau or Arts et Métiers.
All utilities included.
